fields.label: Background
fields.name: hero_background
fields.instructions:
Upload the background image for the hero here (at least 1920 x 1000 px)

This image also serves as the fallback image for the background image (if enabled).

fields.label: Horizontal Background Alignment
fields.name: hero_horizontal_background_alignment
fields.instructions:
How should the image be horizontally aligned?

0 = Left-Aligned 50 = Centered 100 = Right-Aligned

fields.label: Vertical Background Alignment
fields.name: hero_vertical_background_alignment
fields.instructions:
How should the image be vertically aligned?

0 = Top-Aligned 50 = Centered 100 = Bottom-Aligned

The grid is 12 columns across. If the left and right content span more than 12 columns combined, they will wrap.
